website_summaries.verdict: Customers looking for a versatile tube should check out this highly rated option that expands and comes with helpful accessories.
pros: Offers transparent lid with ID card
Adjustable in length up to 40 inches
Resistant to light and waterproof for ultimate document protection
Clever locking mechanism keeps adjusted height in place
cons: Some buyers report product arriving damaged
Lip around edge can bend documents without careful handling

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the color! Easy to tell mine apart from the million white and black ones. Also expandable to fit various poster sizes without it being too large than you need. My only small gripe is that I wish there was a better way to lock it into place. For the most part it stays but sometimes when I'm trying to open it I twist it just so and the expandable portion becomes unlocked. It's not a super big deal as this doesn't happen spontaneously when I'm carrying it or anything. Overall, would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable length
customer_reviews.text: I used the tube to archive original house plans and redlined drawings that were different sizes. I was able to adjust the tube to fit the largest drawing. By twisting the tube, I was able to lock in the length I needed.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Fits large posters very well
customer_reviews.text: Using this to protect some ancient screen printed wall graphics and offset posters from the 80's that had gotten a lot of abuse while sitting loose in boxes. The tube expanded wide enough to hold some very large prints. Now, it has a safer place away from dust and sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Julia E. Perry

customer_reviews.title: This tube is great. I bought it to use for an X-Wing ...
customer_reviews.text: This tube is great. I bought it to use for an X-Wing board game mat, which it would be great for, but right now it is holding a crazy amount of posters that I don’t have the room for presently. The fact that it is adjustable and sturdy may inspire me to buy another in the future
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Mermini

customer_reviews.title: Best one of these I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Best one of these I've ever had, and I've had a few. I also like the bright yellow color, which makes it easier to avoid (a) walking off without the tube, which you've usually got leaning against a wall or something to keep it out of your way, and (b) having someone else walk off with your tube inadvertently at a conference where lots of folks have their posters in such tubes (I've known folks who've had this happen). Well-made. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size for a Map
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a large D&D map and the extend-ability on this is really great. The map fits perfect and protects well. The plastic of this holder I give a 2 out of 5 as if anything heavy lands on it I am pretty sure it would crush completely. It does the job if you are only storing the map until your next D&D game, but i was hoping it would be sturdier and more durable. Overall I can only give this a 3 out of 5 as I can see me replacing this if we must take our gaming map out of the house for any reason.
customer_reviews.author: Imke

customer_reviews.title: Great for corporate banner metal parts!
customer_reviews.text: This tube is multifunctional. I am currently using it for banner stand parts for our corporate marketing banner. It fits our metal parts nicely. The tube is durable and travels well which is the reason I purchased it in the first place. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke03

customer_reviews.title: Great way to carry items
customer_reviews.text: This tube is made of good plastic. It changes lengths to fit the various size of blueprints, drawings, etc. I was surprised that it doesn’t screw completely shut. I was concerned that the drawing I’d given my son to take back home with him might fall out unknowingly. I decided to tape it shut for added security. The included carrying strap seemed a bit short for my 5’11” so I replaced it with a longer strap ensuring hands-free carrying.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Kobayashi

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design on small 20-27 inch tube
customer_reviews.text: The smaller version of the tube (20 - 27 inch) has a completely different design than the larger one. There is no end cap - you have to extend the tube the entire length to take the 2 halves apart. This also requires that you completely take off the should strap, which defeats the purpose of having one. And despite having grooves on the side of the tube, it does not lock into place at all. You would easily crush your poster inside of this if you pressed down on one end. Do not buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations for this. I wanted to use it for holding an assortment of lightweight wooden rods. The first one I slid in and thought all was fine until I had six in and closed the lid. I picked it up and they fell through the bottom. Some how it busted. Upon further inspection I see that the plastic is very thin. I would be leery of using it to haul anything of importance.
customer_reviews.author: Harry smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to transporting artwork OR a fishing pole!
customer_reviews.text: It fits in my suitcase for transporting my artwork when I travel. It also expands if I need to and can go in the overhead on an airplane. I am sure it is sturdy enough to go as a checked piece of baggage, I personally wouldn't do that, due to obvious sticky finger issues. It's waterproof, lightweight and tough; if I need another one I would certainly re-order this product!
customer_reviews.author: karendillingham

customer_reviews.title: Preserve pictures this way
customer_reviews.text: It’s great I found this most of the time I have tried to prevent art done on large paper from curling by pressing it flat but it’s actually better to roll it in the cylinder shape because it won’t warp or wrinkle the page. I almost didn’t find the product I needed because mail carrier doesn’t show packing tubes
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic! Arrived damaged! Don’t waste your time with it!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived cracked. The carrying strap is fraying. It is made of a cheap plastic that I can’t imagine would hold up to very much if banged around. I am not sure how so many people are satisfied with it. I would not recommend it even if it hadn’t arrived cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Erin M Katz

customer_reviews.title: Rollin' It Up
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for taking to concerts and music festivals!! It's sturdy enough to not get crushed when getting bumped around and light enough to string over the shoulder and still boogie down. Cover it with stickers and put some pins on the strap and you'll look like a poster gathering wanderer.
customer_reviews.author: Frater Zion

customer_reviews.title: Safe Storage
customer_reviews.text: We had several prints that we wanted to store safely and also compactly. I bought this tube and feel confident that the prints are safely stored. The best part is this tube itself is easy to store at the top of my closet, taking up much less room than the prints themselves. The only con to this purchase is the smell. Whoofta! This tube has a strong smell when opened. This seems like a minor complaint since it really doesn't affect my purpose for it, but I just think I should caution.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Best tube value going!
customer_reviews.text: These are a perfect alternative to the over-priced tubes I see elsewhere. While these aren't bullet-proof, they are more than adequate for transporting prints, posters, targets, etc.
customer_reviews.author: The Givenator

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy...
customer_reviews.text: The tube itself is very flimsy and the locking mechanism it VERY difficult to lock in place because the surrounding tube is flimsy. Also, the strap attachment broke with. The first hour of using it. Since I’m just using it as storage, I’m not going to bother replacing it, but I will absolutely never buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: aNanoMoose

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Whether you’re carrying nautical charts or construction drawings this tube will get it done. It’s appears quite durable and adjusts east to carry all of my documents. I would however recommend a larger tube if your construction project is larger and you have a thick stack of prints.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Seabee

customer_reviews.title: Not for Pros.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put a collection of posters and maps, that I wanted to put away and keep protected. It does that. The tube is flimsy and very light duty. I ended up taping the expandable part, because it would not lock in place. DO NOT USE for travel or expensive items. It WILL NOT do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Chassity Burks

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Dropped it from about 3 ft and this happened. It had a single 18” X 25” print in it. I wasn’t pleased with the durability at all. Had it a very short time. Less than a month when this happened.
customer_reviews.author: DeeBee

customer_reviews.title: Seller is quickk to fix any issues. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: First one came in and the cap was not only cracked, but a piece was even broken off. Got it picked up and replaced with no charge. The replacement came in quickly, but the cap was again cracked. However, it is hardly noticable and stores my D&D battle map perfectly. The expandable size is a nice addition as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Henning Jr.

customer_reviews.title: would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I like this better than the ones that the cap comes up and the strap is connected to it. The ones with the strap connected to it is annoying as you twist the cap off and the strap keeps twisting. No need for that with this one
customer_reviews.author: Juni

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff...
customer_reviews.text: Not super easy to get the ruled paper out once it’s in, but everything else works great. Sturdy, easy, good for caring around your shoulders, and extendable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: I was quite disappointed in this product after receiving. It functions just as described, however it won’t stay in the slot you select when adjusting for length. The diameter was too small for my needs but I put that on me. The flimsy plastic makes it lightweight, however the adjustability isn’t what I had hoped for. It adjusts, but won’t stay where I select.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M. Coy

customer_reviews.title: does not stay extended
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to carry paper targets. I extended it to fit my targets but the tabs you lock it into when. you extend it are week because the plastic is to light weight. At the slightest bump it pushes closed and the lid poops off The manufacturer should think about securing the lid to the tube. I almost lost the lid when it popped off.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, expandable, waterproof document holder
customer_reviews.text: I am using this product to store architect drawings that are being created for an addition to my home. It provides safe storage for when I am out in the elements meeting with contractors.
customer_reviews.author: Linda W

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, not a good product.
customer_reviews.text: Junk, I just literally dropped it from 2 feet at the airport and it's already broken. I will be returning it...
customer_reviews.author: Robert paschal

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to travel with posters to a work conference. I liked the end where I could cut and put my business card to help label it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to take our ugly stick pole on the airplane for vacation. Great idea worked good
customer_reviews.author: Tonyia Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy tube, strap too short
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a number of tubes, but while this one was just as good as sturdy as others, the strap is too snug even extending it to the maximum. Not comfortable when wrapping around the body for travel.
customer_reviews.author: RJC

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Tube was a great quality for the price and the adjustable size was perfect for me. I had a set of rolled house plans that needed good storage without overwhelming a file. This was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Katie M

customer_reviews.title: Broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Broken on arrival. I will still use it as a storage container. Just means the strap won’t be functional.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie

customer_reviews.title: Smells like its made out of recycled porta potty plastic
customer_reviews.text: The tubes reek with a smell reminiscent of a urinal cake. I don't know why this is, but it is so strong, it must be intentional. Any artwork or paper stored inside would inevitably pick up this disgusting smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I needed an expanding tube to store and protect some posters and this worked perfectly! It was exactly what I needed and it's a wonderful product! This tube is well made and the sturdy plastic provides a great shell for protection. Definitely would buy again should the need arise.
customer_reviews.author: kecksburg65

customer_reviews.title: Use for art AND MORE...
customer_reviews.text: Nice features, but I didn't want it for art. I purchased this tube to contain my trekking poles, in my checked luggage. The adjustment feature is perfect, but the tube is a little more flexible than I hoped for. I think it will serve purpose; the tube will "give" instead of poles. I hope so, anyway
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A. Lukasiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent itet
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift to our college student for presentation posters at conferences. Very pleased with document tube.
customer_reviews.author: Steve P

customer_reviews.title: Good research protector
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy yet super lightweight, and does it's job of keeping my research poster safe. I haven't tested it out in rain to see if it's weatherproof, but it looks like it might be okay travelling in light rain.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: It's lightweight and holds the gaming maps I need no matter what size they are. It's not as sturdy or heavy duty as some of the professional architect versions but doesn't seem flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ann Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Brilliantly designed to adjust in size.  Stout enough to protect the things I care about.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great find for a screaming bargain price.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Crow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Rising Sun mat!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to house the mat from our Rising Sun board game. With the ability to adjust the length I was able to fit it perfectly. A great investment to protect another investment :)
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Seymour

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what I needed at a very affordable price. Easy to use and expands to accommodate longer items. Comes with a strap and is very durable. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: HurrikanePDX

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Very light and durable enough to protect its contents. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dallasj

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the poster tube was great. Kept my poster safe as I traveled abroad
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the poster tube was great. Kept my poster safe as I traveled abroad. Hardy plastic, stays closed when you need it to. 4 stars because the strap is far too short. My poster was only 33" (normal poster size) and the strap would only fit over one shoulder - I couldn't put it over my head to hang on my back.
customer_reviews.author: E Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a very affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Love my document holder. This is the 2nd tube i have bought from this seller. I use them to store oversized vinyl board game mats. Well worth the price. And i will definitely buy again if need be.
customer_reviews.author: F.J. Flores

customer_reviews.title: Range targets
customer_reviews.text: Nice and durable. Use it for holding my targets when I go to the range.
customer_reviews.author: travon herriotte

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: I am storing something heavier than documents, so even though it is not being used for it's intended purpose, it has worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: MaggieIac

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is thin, so it’s not too heavy, but still very sturdy. The lid screws onto the outside, so there’s no concern of rain getting in. Pretty solid product and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Rowan-Crook

customer_reviews.title: Mostly very light weight and easy to carry with the strap
customer_reviews.text: I. now own two of them...One in blue and one in green. Very attractive colors. Mostly very light weight and easy to carry with the strap. I'm a musician, and use one of them for my batons, and one for a plastic flute. I'm now looking for a foam rubber sleeve to light them with. It would be great if there was an option for a lining. Never the less, they are are sturdy, and I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Flutegirl

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable storage tube.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality materials and working mechanism. Took a while to arrive as it came from China but worth the wait. Will be using this to hand carry a rolled up oil painting canvas on a flight.
customer_reviews.author: JDLM

customer_reviews.title: Cut the lip on the inside off
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but the lip on the inside makes it difficult to remove documents or posters or mats from the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dj T

customer_reviews.title: Durable poster tube
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for international conference poster travel. Held up great! Durable and much better quality than some previous plastic tubes I have inherited from previous students/faculty at our university. The mint green is bright and beautiful also, no leaving this behind due to camouflaging in the overhead bin!
customer_reviews.author: Khgrf

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but there is area for improvement
customer_reviews.text: When the tube is stretched, the strap becomes too short and therefore useless. It is NOT waterproof, rain can easily get inside. Other than that, the quality/price ratio seems reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: RPD

customer_reviews.title: Works for us
customer_reviews.text: Got it just in time for our trip. Used it to bring bag some art. Didn't have to extend tube, so can't comment on that. Going to our destination we filled it with wife's hair products!
customer_reviews.author: Juan A. Gon

customer_reviews.title: Ok plastic for storage
customer_reviews.text: Fits posters. When extended it does not have a sturdy lock.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Bottom is cheap plastic, arrived in tact, but rolled out of the car and cracked right away.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, but it is cheap near the bottom, it rolled out of my car and the bottom cracked. I just wrapped it in duct tape. They should put some nice rubber around the ends
customer_reviews.author: Mark Evans

customer_reviews.title: Protecting my poster
customer_reviews.text: I had to transport my poster for my capstone project by plane and I was extremely nervous about it getting damaged. Thanks to the durability of the tube, my poster arrived safely and I went on to pass my capstone!
customer_reviews.author: Ms TSquared

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to turn the tube and it fall out of ...
customer_reviews.text: This serves the purpose but the locking process for the tube (twist and lock) is not secure. It is easy to turn the tube and it fall out of the lock area. It is not a bad product. I think if the tube was stiffer the locking method would work fine
customer_reviews.author: Average Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Destroyed by KLM
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid attention to other reviews - this tube was destroyed by aircraft baggage handling on its first use. Became a real pain to continue transporting my hiking poles and get them back home - note the tape at bottom (lid got lost) and lots of cracks. At last stop I used UPS to get the poles home. I'd like my money back and reimbursement for shipping the poles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: great item - good value - just what I needed for prints I have.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella W.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine and as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as advertised. Ordered it 5 days before a cross country trip and it came in plenty of time. Adjusted easily. Adjustment is a little easy to come undone but I didn't have a problem. I was able to take it on planes across the US with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best poster tube I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This is the best poster tube I've ever bought. The color means it won't get confused with others when exabitions are closing, or on airport bagage claim when they don't let me take it in the cabin. It has held up very well and I'll buy it again when I have more work to store.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Zervigon

customer_reviews.title: Easy-to-use and durable
customer_reviews.text: The tube was very easy to open and my poster fit perfectly after readjustment. I had no problems traveling with the tube on the airplane, even though the tube rolled out when the someone opened the overhead compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Expandble Storage Tube from 24.5 to 40 inches.
customer_reviews.text: This storage tube was perfect for my maps of the Hawaiian Islands that I use to navigate the waters off Oahu & Maui. I purchased a second one for additional maps. Great design!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, well priced, lightweight but sturdy & easy to carry around - would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BookBabe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect poster protector
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect product for protection of my craft booth sign. Very easy to use, easy to store, and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: DreamyJeanie

customer_reviews.title: Priced good for the quality
customer_reviews.text: It's not quite as sturdy as some out there so I gave it 3 stars, but it's great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mary E Flickinger

customer_reviews.title: Took this bad boy across the country a few times for several ...
customer_reviews.text: Took this bad boy across the country a few times for several research conferences with no trouble: the telescoping stays put, the strap is easy to adjust, and the lid keeps my precious poster in the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Rhianna Wolsleger

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this document tube for moving peacock feathers and it worked great - was able to adjust the length to fit the longest of the feathers.
customer_reviews.author: Grangie

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This container held up in 7 different overheard bins as I traveled to and from my research conference. I highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this poster holder backpack! My boyfriend loved it for all his dead and Company shows
customer_reviews.author: R Garcia

customer_reviews.title: strap is wayy too short
customer_reviews.text: the strap i received with this tube cannot be used with the tube in the extended position, does not arrive as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Mango

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought one to use for my finished diamond paintings that I haven't framed yet.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with the opening on this tube.
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent tube. I decided to try it because it is reasonably priced. The reason it’s a 2 star tube is because it has a small lip at the opening(see pics). This opening tends to grab the posters on the way out of the tube. I haven’t had anything damaged from it but I’ve had enough close calls that I’m going to try a different tube.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Strap could be longer
customer_reviews.text: Only wished the carry strap was longer when the tube is deployed to full length.
customer_reviews.author: anonymojs

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this tube to carry a fishing rod. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: butch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, was able to bring it to Australia on the plane no problems (checked bag/oversize luggage). A++
customer_reviews.author: EAcheers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Just Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great and durable. I would recommend this to anyone. I still have mine after 2 years. Great for conventions
customer_reviews.author: Anime & all things Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly for a 15 page 24”x30” blueprint I needed to store.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for those playmats, artworks and blueprints etc and etc?!
customer_reviews.author: Danny Cartagena

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dented, not a good sign
customer_reviews.text: The tube arrived with dents in the plastic walls. Considering that the whole point of the tube is to be a rigid case for what’s inside, that doesn’t give me a lot of confidence. Requested a return and bought a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: College Student

customer_reviews.title: Great value at this price!
customer_reviews.text: Very simple and easy to use. The plastic seems to be good quality for the price and I feel comfortable with my map being in that case. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job done
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to transport 3’x3’ gaming mats between my home and the store. Sometimes I even strap it to my motorcycle to transport the mats. No complaints. It is strong and protective. It gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sleek design and lightweight. The adjustable tube length is very helpful when buying multiple poster sizes.
customer_reviews.author: thomas powell

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brought this to carry some Travel Fishing rods. seems to be made well and will work for my needs
customer_reviews.author: rod

customer_reviews.title: Expensive plastic
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be really nice quality, but it's made of very cheap plastic and it's freaking cracked!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: I used this to store a large playmat for a board game. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Let me bring on plane fully extended as a personal item along with my carry on.
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect. Light weight, but sturdy. Easily collapsible and was usedvto hold 2 ugly stick fishing rods. The strap was very convenient for hands free travel. Got to take it on the plane as a personal item along with my carry on bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Granucci

customer_reviews.title: Good poster tube
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this for the posters I present at academic conferences. It's worked really well so far for me and my friends who have borrowed it from me.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Huang

customer_reviews.title: It suited my needs greatly.
customer_reviews.text: It fit a good deal of my posters(of various sizes) in it. It greatly fulfilled it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Durable and perfect for research poster
customer_reviews.text: My poster (40 inchs long) fits well in the tube, and it is easy to carry and is durable.
customer_reviews.author: crystalyiyi

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to hold My fishing poles for vacation. Nice and sturdy. Going to make a good travel case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poster tube, multi uses
customer_reviews.text: I installed the tube in the roof of my Polaris Ranger to hold my USGS topo maps. Works great! Maps stay clean, dry, and out of the way until needed.
customer_reviews.author: Delbert Holan

customer_reviews.title: Both orders broken
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item, the box was all tore up and the cap was broken. Ordered a replacement and it was broken as well. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Huffman

customer_reviews.title: I also wish that the lock used to hold in place the expanded poster tube wasn't so easy to unlock
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, though I wish the material was stronger. I also wish that the lock used to hold in place the expanded poster tube wasn't so easy to unlock. I used tape to make sure it wouldn't unlock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Expands
customer_reviews.text: It expands to hold taller banners. We show at fairs so I have banners that we store and gave different sizes. It is perfect that keeping them from getting damaged in between shows and during travel.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Hayes

customer_reviews.title: I was pleased with the product with one exception
customer_reviews.text: I used the tube to transport a custom made banner. I was pleased with the product with one exception. The translucent cover on the cap cracked easily when the tube tipped over and lightly hit the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tube worked well and I will use it in the future!
customer_reviews.author: August West Fennario

customer_reviews.title: broke very easily
customer_reviews.text: This is made out of light weight plastic. It broke very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good price, works great
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the cheaper poster tubes, so it's not fancy, but it does the job great and its easy to use and adjust the size.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Functional poster tube. Keeps my posters from getting wet ...
customer_reviews.text: Functional poster tube. Keeps my posters from getting wet, crushed, or otherwise damaged. It is adjustable for different poster sizes and has a handy strap.
customer_reviews.author: Harmonie

product_meta.title: DEWEL Document Poster Tube with Clear ID Card Cap, Water and Light Resistant Telescoping Flexible Plastic Storage Tube for Blueprints, Prints, Posters, Targets,Artworks and Drawings (Red)
feature_bullets: Expandable Storage Tube：The storage tube could expand from 24.5" up to 40" and the diameter is 3.12”, so handle various poster dimensions.

Unlimited Use: The plastic tube could be used to storage and travel posters, blue prints, maps, documents, large photo prints, drawings, artwork, arrows, fishing rods, drum sticks, or whatever else you can imagine.

Unique Lock Design: Twist it according to the arrow direction, can easily and firmly lock your favorite poster in the tube case safely. Removable transparent cover to lid let’s you add identification or labeling to the tube.

Strong and Lightweight: Poster Tube is made of rigid plastic to protect contents from bending or creasing in transit. The document tube is also waterproof and light-resistant, protects documents against fading from exposure to sun light.
Adjustable Belt: The Carrying case has an extra long shoulder strap that is comfortable for use even when the tube is fully extended.
